ontologies.title: ontologies
ontologies.description: Enter a list of metabolite ID's prepended by ID source (e.g. kegg:C00412).

analytes-from-pathways.title: Analytes from Pathways
analytes-from-pathways.examples: De Novo Triacylglycerol Biosynthesis, sphingolipid metabolism
analytes-from-pathways.description: Analytes (genes, proteins, metabolites) can be retrieve by pathway. Enter a list of exact pathway names.
